title: SFI webinar for organic farmers: register to attend

content.text: On 13 October, we’re holding a webinar on the Sustainable Farming Incentive (SFI) for organic farmers and growers.
Christopher Stopes, Co-chair of the English Organic Forum will introduce the hour-long session.
Our colleagues Daniel De Cruz and David Sillett, part of the Farming and Countryside Programme, will then set out the offer.
The Rural Payments Agency (RPA) will go on to explain the process to apply for an agreement.
There will be time to ask questions.
We encourage organic farmers, growers and those considering organic conversion to attend.
Register to attend the webinar on Friday 13 October at midday.
The session will be recorded, so if you can’t make the webinar, don’t worry. As soon as it’s over, we’ll upload the recording to this post and you can watch it whenever it suits you.
This is the second farmer webinar we’ve held. We’re setting up a series of them. If you have feedback or suggestions, do leave a comment below.
